code:
import{Start,loginSucces,Failed,signUpSucces,signupFailed,resetError}from'./userRedux';import{publicRequest}from'../axiosReqMethods';import{setError}from'./errorRedux';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';//login
export const login=async(dispatch,user)=>{const{email,password,ip}=user;console.log(ip);dispatch(Start());try{const res=await publicRequest.post("api/auth/login",{email,password});console.log(user);dispatch(loginSucces(res.data));return true;}catch(error){dispatch(Failed(error.response.data.message));dispatch(setError(error.response.data.message));//reseting error
setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(resetError());},5000);}};//signup
export const signUp=async(dispatch,user)=>{dispatch(Start());try{const res=await publicRequest.post("api/auth/register",user);dispatch(signUpSucces(res.data));console.log(res.data);if(res.data!=undefined){return true;}}catch(error){dispatch(signupFailed(error.response.data.message));dispatch(setError(error.response.data.message));//reseting error
setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(resetError());},5000);}};
